title: Version
description: A version of a software application.

type.description: The type of the version. Unless otherwise noted, use 'release'.

label.description: An optional label for the version that provides additional context, such as 'Minor Update' or 'Security Patch'.

versionNumber.description: The version number of the application. Remove prefixes such as 'v', 'Version', or 'Beta'.

releaseDate.description: The date the version was released, formatted as YYYY-MM-DD.

releaseNotes.description: The official release notes for the version, formatted as a Markdown list.
